Module com.example.towersofhanoi
Package com.example.towersofhanoi.Model

Class PlayerGame

java.lang.Object
com.example.towersofhanoi.Model.Game
com.example.towersofhanoi.Model.PlayerGame
public class PlayerGame extends Game
The PlayerGame class represents a game of Towers of Hanoi played by a player. It extends the Game class and adds functionality specific to player-controlled moves and animations.

  • Field Summary
